name: Diffusion (Jasb)
description:
Diffusion is a horror game inspire by Gmod Nextbot, and a wee bit of Roblox

Doors. Run around a small maze with unwanted visitor inside, outrun and survive until the timer runs out and enter the elevator to achieve victory. Or run endlessly

and see how long you can survive, is just a matter of time before the monster comes and have a little chat with you.

This game is made in 2 week, and is my first ever game so don't expect it to be good lmao, at least is fun for me at least lol.

Hope you enjoy

Subscribe to my channel lol: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBf24mby5PyZUzkxOkCwjJg
